data.actual_result: It clips through the guild drawer then disappears after a short time, 10 seconds or so.
data.expected_result: The text cursor doesn't clip through the guild drawer
data.short_description: Text cursor stays on screen when guild drawer is opened.
data.steps_to_repro: - Bring up your keyboard (for me it's Gboard) - Long press to bring up the copy/paste and text scroll cursor - close the keyboard and open the guild drawer (try to do it quickly, it can be time sensitive) -
